
Task 1:
Sqrt(2) = 1.4142135623731
5th root of 2 = 1.14869835499704
e^pi = 23.1406926327793
Pi^e = 22.459157718361

Task 2:
*Γ(1) = 0.999999989064903
*Γ(2) = 0.999999989064903
*Γ(3) = 1.99999997812981
*Γ(4) = 5.99999993438942
*Γ(5) = 23.9999997375577
*Γ(6) = 119.999998687788
*Γ(7) = 719.99999212673
*Γ(8) = 5039.99994488711
*Γ(9) = 40319.9995590969
*Γ(10) = 362879.997652016
the actual factorial results:
Γ(1) = 1
Γ(2) = 1
Γ(3) = 2
Γ(4) = 6
Γ(5) = 24
Γ(6) = 120
Γ(7) = 720
Γ(8) = 5040
Γ(9) = 40320
Γ(10) = 362880
They are close enough

Task 3:
The result of lngamma for n = 1,2,...,10
*Γ(1) = -1.09350976051914E-08
*Γ(2) = -1.09350976051914E-08
*Γ(3) = 0.693147169624848
*Γ(4) = 1.79175945829296
*Γ(5) = 3.17805381941285
*Γ(6) = 4.78749173184695
*Γ(7) = 6.579251201075
*Γ(8) = 8.52516135013032
*Γ(9) = 10.6046028918102
*Γ(10) = 12.8018274736111
